statements: SELECT * FROM galleries
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM galleries
SELECT gallery_name, director FROM galleries WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM galleries WHERE director LIKE 'John%'
SELECT gallery_name, location, director FROM galleries ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM galleries WHERE location = 'New York' AND director LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM galleries ORDER BY gallery_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT director FROM galleries ORDER BY director DESC
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM galleries WHERE director = 'Johnson' OR location = 'Los Angeles'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_galleries FROM galleries
SELECT * FROM galleries;
SELECT gallery_id, gallery_name, location FROM galleries;
SELECT exhibition_name, start_date, end_date FROM exhibitions;
SELECT gallery_name, location, gallery_id FROM galleries;
SELECT * FROM exhibitions;
SELECT * FROM galleries;
SELECT gallery_id, gallery_name FROM galleries WHERE gallery_name='Art Gallery';
SELECT exhibition_name, start_date, end_date FROM exhibitions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT gallery_id, COUNT(exhibition_id) AS num_exhibitions FROM exhibitions GROUP BY gallery_id;
SELECT g.gallery_name, e.exhibition_name, e.start_date, e.end_date FROM galleries g JOIN exhibitions e ON g.gallery_id = e.gallery_id;
SELECT * FROM art_galleries;
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM art_galleries ORDER BY gallery_name ASC;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'French';
SELECT * FROM artworks WHERE price > 10000;
SELECT gallery_name, COUNT(*) AS total_artworks FROM artworks INNER JOIN art_galleries ON artworks.gallery_id = art_galleries.gallery_id GROUP BY gallery_name ORDER BY total_artworks DESC;
SELECT * FROM art_galleries WHERE gallery_name = 'Museum of Modern Art';
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'French' ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT artwork_name, creation_date, price FROM artworks WHERE price > 10000 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM art_galleries JOIN artworks ON art_galleries.gallery_id = artworks.gallery_id WHERE artwork_name LIKE '%Sunflower%';

SELECT artist_name, art_style, gallery_name FROM artists INNER JOIN artworks ON artists.artist_id = artworks.artist_id INNER JOIN art_galleries ON artworks.gallery_id = art_galleries.gallery_id WHERE art_style = 'Impressionism' ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM art_galleries;
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM art_galleries WHERE gallery_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'French';
SELECT * FROM exhibitions WHERE date_start >= '2022-01-01' AND date_end <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT artwork_title, price FROM artworks WHERE medium = 'Oil Painting';
SELECT * FROM art_galleries;
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM art_galleries ORDER BY gallery_name ASC;
SELECT exhibition_name, date_start, date_end FROM exhibitions WHERE date_start >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, nationality, COUNT(artwork_id) AS total_artworks FROM artists JOIN artworks ON artists.artist_id = artworks.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name, nationality;
SELECT a.artwork_title, a.medium, a.price, ar.artist_name FROM artworks a JOIN artists ar ON a.artist_id = ar.artist_id WHERE a.medium = 'Oil Painting' ORDER BY a.price DESC;
SELECT * FROM art_galleries;
SELECT gallery_id, gallery_name FROM art_galleries;
SELECT artist_name, artist_nationality FROM artists;
SELECT exhibition_name, start_date, end_date FROM exhibitions;
SELECT artwork_title, price FROM artwork;
SELECT * FROM art_galleries;
SELECT gallery_name, gallery_location FROM art_galleries ORDER BY gallery_location ASC;
SELECT artwork_title, price FROM artwork WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT artist_name, artist_dob, artist_nationality FROM artists WHERE artist_nationality = 'French';
SELECT gallery_name, start_date, end_date FROM exhibitions ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
